Indicted Sierra Leone ex-president Koroma flies to NigeriaSierra Leone's ex-president Ernest Bai Koroma left the West African country by plane and flew to Nigeria on Friday, two Reuters reporters said, after a court allowed him to travel abroad on medical grounds despite treason charges. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 18:57:43 GMT CVKTFQWUIBONNLDHJ743RKOGXI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/indicted-sierra-leone-ex-president-koroma-flies-nigeria-2024-01-19/Reuters世界非洲
EU targets six people under new Hamas sanctions schemeThe European Union on Friday imposed asset freezes and travel bans on six people it said were linked to Hamas, under a new sanctions regime targeting the Palestinian militant group. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:55:27 GMT B7QIOM4WJRKMBMOQX3RLIPM6ZY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-targets-six-people-under-new-hamas-sanctions-scheme-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Biden discussed developments in Israel, Gaza with Netanyahu, White House saysU.S. President Joe Biden discussed developments in Israel and Gaza with Israeli Prime Minster Benjamin Netanyahu in a phone call on Friday, the White House said, as the Israeli military continued a major advance in the southern Gaza Strip. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:41:21 GMT XOKITH53YBPL5GGIZASMRRP7KA https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-discussed-developments-israeli-gaza-with-netanyahu-white-house-says-2024-01-19/Reuters世界
Slovak parliament chief confirms presidential bid, facing ex-foreign ministerSlovak parliament chief Peter Pellegrini, leader of the second-biggest party in the government coalition, confirmed on Friday that he would run in a March presidential election. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:39:50 GMT 2XLZVQNK3RN4NIQ6UZWPZAHRDA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/slovak-parliament-chief-confirms-presidential-bid-faceing-ex-foreign-minister-2024-01-19/Jason Hovet世界欧洲
Aid workers can make little impact on 'ocean' of need in Gaza - MSFMedical aid workers are only able to help with a tiny fraction of Gaza's humanitarian needs as conditions there deteriorate following nearly 15 weeks of war, staff from Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:31:28 GMT IDZPPE6Q6FPB3LFCGCXEHDNZZA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/aid-workers-can-make-little-impact-ocean-need-gaza-msf-2024-01-19/Aidan Lewis世界中东地区
More grain ships divert from Red Sea after attacksAttacks on shipping in the Red Sea region have in past days led to a sharp rise in the number of grain cargoes being diverted around the Cape of Good Hope, rather than using the Suez Canal, grain traders and analysts said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:31:00 GMT C53NZKI7O5NUHBBFI2WNDUMAVI https://www.reuters.com/world/more-grain-ships-divert-red-sea-after-attacks-2024-01-19/Reuters世界
Iraq finds nearly $800 million fraud in funds for Islamic State victims - state mediaIraq's National Security Service announced it had uncovered a corruption scheme involving fraud and embezzlement of payments intended for victims of Islamic State that saw more than 1 trillion Iraqi dinars ($760 million) taken from state coffers. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:13:09 GMT YG6AKVXLDRIHNMBJO7S6NK7G6U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraq-finds-nearly-800-million-fraud-funds-islamic-state-victims-state-media-2024-01-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Brazil backs Beijing's 'One China policy,' foreign minister Wang Yi saysChinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday welcomed Brazil's support for Beijing's "One China policy" that states Taiwan is an inseparable part of China, a move that strengthens bilateral ties with South America's largest country. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 17:11:39 GMT FZCLBNVUOVPHNF274TRANIQSS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/brazil-backs-beijings-one-china-policy-foreign-minister-wang-yi-says-2024-01-19/Anthony Boadle世界
Heard in Davos: What we learned from the WEF in 2024World leaders and business executives left the freezing temperatures of the Swiss mountain resort of Davos after a week of high-stakes meetings about key world issues. Argentina arrests, deports relatives of fugitive Ecuador gang leader 'Fito'Argentine authorities detained the wife and children of fugitive Ecuadorean drug trafficker Jose Adolfo Macias and deported them early on Friday to Ecuador, authorities said. US Treasury, Chinese finance officials agree to keep meeting after Beijing talksMeetings between U.S. Treasury and Chinese financial officials in Beijing this week concluded with both sides agreeing to continue to meet regularly, the Treasury Department said on Friday.
